options.name: Trained Hunters
options.description: Lizardmen are brought up from a young age hunting in harsh conditions and require keen senses and skills. Gain +1 Wilderness and +1 Search.

options.name: Meat on a Stick
options.description: Cooking is an essential part of Lizardman culture, gaining +1 Cooking. When you Craft a Basic Meal using 2 Meat, you produce an Improved Meal instead of a Basic one.

options.name: Steppe Brawlers
options.description: The Lizardmen hunt massive Creatures at a distance with long spears and ranged weapons. Gain +1 Damage with Piercing and Ranged Weapons.

options.name: Grand Migrations
options.description: The Lizardmen are migratory and are well equipped to deal with the wilderness. You gain +2 Fire and Cold Mitigation and get credit for a Favorable Rest when sleeping outside.

options.name: Free Action : Savage Fighting
options.description: When you miss with a Melee Attack, you make a quick and brutal Unarmed Attack against the same Target with a 1d4 Attack Penalty but an additional 2d6 damage.

options.name: Stalking
options.description: The Lizardmen are trained at an early age to move both quickly and quietly to set up ambushes. Gain +1 Initiative, +1 Stealth and +1 Movement Speed.

options.name: Vsthrii Honor Scout
options.description: The highest honor in the Lizardmen culture is being appointed an Honor Scout after proving yourself in the great hunt. Gain +1 Search, +1 Athletics, and +1 Attack with Ranged Weapons.
